summary: Meeting focused on discussing Plotty duplicate management software pricing and implementation, as well as industry classification for scoring models. The team reviewed specific industry categories needed for scoring different types of equipment and businesses. Discussion included detailed breakdown of transportation subcategories and scoring model considerations.
decisions: Proceed with Plotty implementation due to Laura's familiarity and efficiency
Include 6 main industry categories: over-the-road trucking, vocational trucking, construction, agricultural, real estate, and other
action_items: Laura to introduce Michael to Anu regarding Plotty
Laura to add industry classification question to steering committee agenda
Laura meeting with Ross tomorrow about resourcing
Tuesday call scheduled to discuss resourcing and project planning
concerns: Current dupe catcher software is inadequate
Need to avoid buying software that won't be fully utilized
Undefined vocational subtypes need further definition
michael_priorities: Ensuring software purchases are fully utilized
Accurate industry classification for scoring models
Clear naming conventions to avoid confusion
Prioritizing dupe catching solution due to complaints
commitments: Laura committed to implementing Plotty effectively
Michael committed to reviewing Plotty pricing and moving forward
Team to further define vocational subtypes
